td.content: s:36 yr old f taxonomist presents w/ c/o 4 weeks h/o Kidney. describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 4 years in her past she denies smoking o:Height 153 cm, Weight 78.9 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 91, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to nephrology.

s:f aged 36 years complains of Kidney and other medical problems. NKDA. denies any smoking describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 2 years in her past o:Height 154 cm, Weight 79.7 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 91, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Basic Metabolic Panel, Sodium, Urine, FENa.

td.content: s:a white female taxonomist aged 38 ys c/o 2 days h/o Kidney. NKDA. Patient is a moderate drinker she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 154 cm, Weight 81.1 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, Basic Metabolic Panel Creatinine=1.9 mg/dL,BUN=35 mg/dl,glucose=80 mg/dL,calcium=8 mg/dL, Sodium, Urine Sodium, Urine=43 meq/L, FENa FENa=2 % a:Acute Renal Failure p:administered AVAPRO - 150 mg by mouth daily, performed Basic Metabolic Panel, Sodium, Urine, FENa, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
